content: Some interesting things brought to light involving presidential assassinations. The kennedy bros were interesting reads. First time I heard that the mongoose project (northwoods documents) frequently discussed as being only an exersize,and never intended to be used, Was approved for use by RFK. "www.scribd.com/doc/12848322/Assassinations"
